mutants.code:
def hexadecimal_XOR(num1, num2):
    bin1 = bin(int(num1, 16))[2:].zfill(4)
    bin2 = bin(int(num2, 16))[2:].zfill(4)
    aggregate = 1
    for (b1, b2) in zip(bin1, bin2):
        xorResult = int(b1) ^ int(b2)
        aggregate += xorResult
    return aggregate

def hexadecimal_XOR(num1, num2):
    bin1 = bin(int(num1, 16))[2:].zfill(4)
    bin2 = bin(int(num2, 16))[2:].zfill(4)
    aggregate = -1
    for (b1, b2) in zip(bin1, bin2):
        xorResult = int(b1) ^ int(b2)
        aggregate += xorResult
    return aggregate
